text: Christopher Lee Kattan () (born October 19, 1970) is an American actor, comedian, and author. He is best known for his work as a cast member on Saturday Night Live, for playing Doug Butabi in A Night at the Roxbury, and his roles as Bob on the first four seasons of The Middle and Bunnicula in Bunnicula ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:20th-century American actors Category:American comedians Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Culver City, California Category:Living people
title: Chris Kattan
